## IMapRenderingManager.updateOutline() method

Updating the outline rebuilds the outline materials of every outlined mesh.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateOutline(options: {
        thickness: number;
        color: string;
        ghostExtrudedPolygons: boolean;
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { thickness: number; color: string; ghostExtrudedPolygons: boolean; } | outline options from the \[\[Theme\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
